ThingDef.label: zest
ThingDef.description:
The outer peel of citrus fruits, rich in aromatic oils and vibrant flavors.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 zest requires 15 oranges or lemons for a total value of 18, and sells for 7, giving a <color=#33CC33>74.29%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 500 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.14</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.05 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>140</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.11</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
